message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses the development of assistive systems for persons with cognitive disabilities using POMDP models. This falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also discusses the use of probabilistic relational models (PRM) encoded in a relational database, which falls under the category of databases (cs.DB). The paper also involves the use of simulations to validate the resulting POMDP models, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and systems and control (cs.SY).
